ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُم بُرْهَٰنٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَأَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ نُورًا مُّبِينًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Mankind! a clear proof has come to you from your Lord. We have sent down a Clear Light to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O men, you have received infallible proof from your Lord, and We have sent down a beacon light to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O men! A proof has come to you from your Lord, and We have sent down unto you a clear light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Mankind, an undeniable proof has certainly come to you and We have sent you a shining light
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O mankind! Indeed the clear proof from your Lord has come to you, and We have sent down to you a bright light. (The Holy Prophet is a Clear Proof from Allah.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O mankind! Verily, there has come to you a convincing proof from your Lord; and We sent down to you a manifest light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O people! surely there has come to you manifest proof from your Lord and We have sent to you clear light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O men, a proof has now come to you from your Lord; We have sent down to you a manifest light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O mankind! Now hath a proof from your Lord come unto you, and We have sent down unto you a clear light;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Men, you have received clear evidence from your Lord. We have sent down a clear light to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O ye mankind! there surely hath come unto you a proof from your Lord, and We have sent down unto you a manifest light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O mankind! Certainly, a proof has come to you from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a manifest light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O mankind! verily there hath come to you a convincing proof from your Lord: For We have sent unto you a light (that is) manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O mankind! Verily, there has come to you a convincing proof (Prophet Muhammad SAW) from your Lord, and We sent down to you a manifest light (this Quran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O people, a proof has come to you from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O people! A proof has come to you from your Lord, and We sent down to you a clear light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O mankind, there has come to you a conclusive proof from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:174] O people, a proof, a definitive argument, has now come to you from your Lord, against you, namely, the Prophet (s), and We have revealed to you a manifest, a clear, light, namely, the Qur’ān.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 mankind!) people of Mecca! (Now hath a proof from your Lord) a messenger from your Lord: Muhammad (pbuh) (come unto you, and We have sent down unto you) unto your Prophet (a clear light) a Scripture that exposits that which is lawful and that which is unlawful;
